text: Q30. The roots of the quadratic equation "x2 - 11x + 22 = 0" are given by x = 3 and x = 6. What is the base of the numbers? Answer :(8) Solution: x2-11x+22=0 Given roots are x=3,&y=6 Now sum of roots = -b /a @) + (0 = 3+6=r+1 r=8 Also product of roots = c/a @)ex (6, = 2= 3x6=2r+2 18=2r+2 16 = 2r Againr=8 So the base is 8
